claim: To better understand how the exposure interacts with individuals through the media and thus better understand how the possible effects of this exposure can take place, we have developed a logic model that can capture the functioning of hate rhetoric and its consequences (see Figure 1).
title: Figure 1.
caption: Logic model on impact of or association with hate online.
